layout.name: speed
layout.title: Speed
layout.tooltip: The speed at which the spout rises and disappears. Also controls the speed it moves players and NPCs.

layout.name: maxHeight
layout.title: Maximum Height
layout.tooltip: Maximun height in pixels that the spout can reach. 0 means Unlimited.

layout.name: waitTime
layout.title: Wait Time (Frames)
layout.tooltip: How many frames the spout waits before rising.

layout.name: holdTime
layout.title: Hold Time (Frames)
layout.tooltip: How many frames the spout waits before disappearing.

layout.name: doEffect
layout.title: Pre-rise Effect
layout.tooltip: If effects should start to appear 30 frames before rising.

layout.name: effectOffset
layout.title: Effect Offset
layout.tooltip: Distance in pixels that the effects should spawn above or below the spout.
